vivid3d - Documentation

Simple functions

add(arg0, arg1)

Add two numbers

create_cube([position, size, color, alpha, ...])

Creates a cube mesh

create_box([position, size, color, alpha, label])

Creates a box mesh

create_sphere([position, radius, ...])

Creates a sphere

create_ellipsoid(position, radii, ...)

Creates ellipsoid mesh

create_arrow(position, direction, width, ...)

Creates an arrow mesh

create_grid([size, num_of_ticks, tick_size])

Creates a grid
